meanings.definition: The state or quality of being humid.
meanings.sent1: The humidnesses in the room made it hard to breathe.
meanings.sent2: The humidnesses of the tropical rainforest enveloped us as we hiked through.
meanings.sent3: Despite the humidnesses, the little frog seemed to be enjoying the moisture.
meanings.sent4: The humidnesses of the sauna felt like a warm hug after a long day.
meanings.sent5: The humidnesses of the steam room cleared my sinuses instantly.

meanings.definition: The amount of moisture in the air.
meanings.sent1: The plants thrived in the humidnesses of the greenhouse.
meanings.sent2: The humidnesses outside caused the windows to fog up.
meanings.sent3: The humidnesses in the air made the hair frizzy and wild.
meanings.sent4: The humidnesses of the morning mist clung to the trees like a soft blanket.
meanings.sent5: The humidnesses of the storm clouds signaled an impending downpour.
